content: I agree with you. The visually stunning and poetic style of the cinematography in Ben-Hur was groundbreaking and still holds up to this day, leaving a lasting impression on audiences. It created an immersive and engaging experience that kept viewers on the edge of their seats, and added depth and emotion to the story. The use of light and shadow was an important element that added symbolism, mood and atmosphere to the film's visuals. It was indeed a visual masterpiece.
